content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #88

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: HL7 logo isn't mobile friendly.

Submitted by @MichaelTClifton on behalf of @isaacvetter (isaac@epic.com )
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Enhancement
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: HL7 logo isn't mobile friendly.

Comment: The HL7 logo on the site is too large and blurry when viewed on a smartphone.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #88:

Proposed resolution: Persuasive
Proposed resolution comment: Will attempt to update as suggested, dependent upon spec author's poor UX and web design skills.

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
